events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because it is not what I paid for.
The system has identified this case as a refund request based on the customer indicating they want their money back due to receiving an incorrect product.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received by the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received, as well as your order number, so we can process the refund quickly?
I have attached a photo of the wrong item and included my order number in the message to help you process the refund.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. Please keep the incorrect item until we send a return label.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the clear explanation and will wait for the return label.
The refund process has been initiated, and you will receive a confirmation email shortly. Let us know if you have any further questions.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and the return label for the incorrect item.
Yes, I received the refund and the label. Everything was processed smoothly, thank you!
We are closing this case now that your refund has been completed successfully and you are satisfied with the resolution.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback about your recent support experience.
